preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 45 g of Ac, 675 g of La, 180 g of Mg, and 180 g of Tc using a digital scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine the Ac and La powders uniformly. 
 3. Gradually add Mg to the mixture while continuously stirring to ensure even distribution. 
 4. Finally, incorporate the Tc into the mixture, ensuring all components are evenly blended.
